GeneDef.label: very weak mech control
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have extreme issues encoding new subcores to use in mechanoids.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.

GeneDef.label: weak mech control
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have issues encoding new subcores to use in mechanoids.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.

GeneDef.label: somewhat fast encoding speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have slightly improved encoding speed, decreasing the amount of time they need to take to craft new subcores.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.

GeneDef.label: fast encoding speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have improved encoding speed, decreasing the amount of time they need to take to craft new subcores.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.

GeneDef.label: very fast encoding speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have significantly improved encoding speed, decreasing the amount of time they need to take to craft new subcores.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.

GeneDef.label: extremely fast encoding speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have extremely improved encoding speed, decreasing the amount of time they need to take to craft new subcores.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.

GeneDef.label: super fast encoding speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have super improved encoding speed, decreasing the amount of time they need to take to craft new subcores.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.

GeneDef.label: hyper fast encoding speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can encode subcores unbelievably quickly.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.
